00038 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00039 //
00040 // Implementation of configuration.
00041 //
00042 //------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 
00044 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 //
00046 // FUNCTION: is_match
00047 //
00048 // Match a string "str", with glob string "expr".
00049 //
00050 // expr" is a string which may contain '*' and '?' characters. A '*'
00051 // indicates matching zero or more characters (using a greedy compare),
00052 // ?' indicates matching any single character.
00053 //
00054 // Returns a 1 if "str" matches the expression string and returns
00055 // 0 if it does not match.
00056 //
00057 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 
00059 static bool is_match(string expr, string str) {
00060   unsigned e, es, s, ss;
00061   string tmp;
00062   e  = 0; s  = 0;
00063   es = 0; ss = 0;
00064 
00065   while (s != str.length() && expr[e] != '*') {
00066     if ((expr[e] != str[s]) && (expr[e] != '?'))
00067       return false;
00068     e++; s++;
00069   }
00070   while (s != str.length()) {
00071     if (expr[e] == '*') {
00072       e++;
00073       if (e == expr.length()) {
00074         return true;
00075       }
00076       es = e;
00077       ss = s+1;
00078     }
00079     else if (expr[e] == str[s] || expr[e] == '?') {
00080       e++;
00081       s++;
00082     }
00083     else {
00084       e = es;
00085       s = ss++;
00086     }
00087   }
00088   while (expr[e] == '*')
00089     e++;
00090   if(e == expr.length()) {
00091     return true;
00092   }
00093   else {
00094     return false;
00095   }
00096 }

00116 void uvm_config_item::print_match(
00117   uvm_component* inst_req,
00118   std::string instname_req,
00119   std::string field_req
00120 ) const {
00121   cout << "get_config match. " << endl;
00122   cout << "Request: Called from: ";
00123   if (inst_req) { cout << inst_req->name(); } else { cout << "<null-inst>"; }
00124   cout << ". inst_path: " << instname_req << ". field: " << field_req << endl;
00125   cout << "Match: inst_path: " << m_instname << ". field: " << m_field << endl;
00126   cout << "set_config was called from inst: ";
00127   if (m_inst_set_by) { cout << m_inst_set_by->name(); } else { cout << "<null_inst>"; }
00128   cout << endl;
00129 }

00223 void uvm_config_item_object::print() const {
00224   cout << "Configuration item object: " << m_instname << " " << m_field
00225     << " : from component ";
00226   if (m_inst_set_by) {

00230   }

00232     cout << "Object = " << *m_val << endl;

00248 void uvm_config::add_config_item(uvm_config_item* item) {
00249   m_vec.push_back(item);
00250 
00251 }
00252 
00253 uvm_config_item* uvm_config::get_config_item(
00254   uvm_config_type type,
00255   const std::string& instname,
00256   const std::string& field
00257 ) {
00258   string s;
00259   for (unsigned i = 0; i < m_vec.size(); i++) {
00260     uvm_config_item* c = m_vec[m_vec.size() - (i+1)];
00261     if (c->m_type != type) continue;
00262     if (!(is_match(c->m_instname, instname))) continue;
00263     if (!(is_match(c->m_field, field))) continue;
00264     return c;
00265   }
00266   return 0;
00267 }

00334 void uvm_config_mgr::set_config_item(
00335   uvm_component* inst,
00336   uvm_config_item* item
00337 ) {
00338   if (inst) {
00339     inst->config()->add_config_item(item);
00340   } else {
00341     global_config()->add_config_item(item);
00342   }
00343 }

00374 
00375 void uvm_config_mgr::set_config_object(
00376   uvm_component* inst,
00377   const std::string& instname,
00378   const std::string& field,
00379   uvm_object* val,
00380   bool clone 
00381 ) {
00382   uvm_object* obj;
00383   if (clone) {
00384     obj = val->clone();
00385   } else {
00386     obj = val;
00387   } 
00388   uvm_config_item_object* item = 
00389     new uvm_config_item_object(instname,field,inst,obj);
00390   if (inst) {
00391     inst->config()->add_config_item(item);
00392   } else {
00393     global_config()->add_config_item(item);
00394   }
00395 }

00397 uvm_config_item_int* uvm_config_mgr::get_config_int_internal(
00398   uvm_component* inst,
00399   const std::string& instname,
00400   const std::string& field,
00401   sc_dt::sc_lv<4096>& val
00402 ) {
00403   uvm_config_item* item = get_config_item(
00404     uvm_config_type_int,
00405     inst,
00406     instname,
00407     field
00408   );
00409   if (!item) {
00410     return 0;
00411   }
00412   uvm_config_item_int* item_int = item->as_int(); 
00413   if (!item_int) {
00414     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_CONFIG_INTERNAL_,"");
00415     return 0;
00416   }
00417   val = item_int->value();
00418   return item_int;
00419 }
00420 
00421 
00422 uvm_config_item_string* uvm_config_mgr::get_config_string(
00423   uvm_component* inst,
00424   const std::string& instname,
00425   const std::string& field,
00426   std::string& val
00427 ) {
00428   uvm_config_item* item = get_config_item(
00429     uvm_config_type_string,
00430     inst,
00431     instname,
00432     field
00433   );
00434   if (!item) {
00435     return 0;
00436   }
00437   uvm_config_item_string* item_string = item->as_string(); 
00438   if (!item_string) {
00439     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_CONFIG_INTERNAL_,"");
00440     return 0;
00441   }
00442   val = item_string->value();
00443   if (print_config_matches()) {
00444     item->print_match(inst,instname,field);
00445     std::cout << "Value: " << val << std::endl;
00446   }
00447   return item_string;
00448 }
00449 
00450 uvm_config_item_object* uvm_config_mgr::get_config_object(
00451   uvm_component* inst,
00452   const std::string& instname,
00453   const std::string& field,
00454   uvm_object*& val,
00455   bool clone
00456 ) {
00457   uvm_config_item* item = get_config_item(
00458     uvm_config_type_object,
00459     inst,
00460     instname,
00461     field
00462   );
00463   if (!item) {
00464     return 0;
00465   }
00466   uvm_config_item_object* item_object = item->as_object(); 
00467   if (!item_object) {
00468     SC_REPORT_ERROR(UVM_CONFIG_INTERNAL_,"");
00469     return 0;
00470   }
00471   if (clone) {
00472     val = item_object->value()->clone();
00473   } else {
00474     val = item_object->value();
00475   }
00476   if (print_config_matches()) {
00477     item->print_match(inst,instname,field);
00478     std::cout << "Value: ";
00479     if (val) { cout << *val << std::endl; } else { cout << "<null-object>" << endl; }
00480   }
00481   return item_object;
00482 }
00483 
00484 uvm_config_item* uvm_config_mgr::get_config_item(
00485   uvm_config_type type,    
00486   uvm_component* inst,
00487   const std::string& instname,
00488   const std::string& field
00489 ) {
00490   // form the stack 
00491   uvm_config_stack stack;
00492   sc_object* parent = inst;
00493   while (parent) {
00494     uvm_component* comp = DCAST<uvm_component*>(parent);
00495     if (comp)
00496       stack.push_back(comp->config());
00497     parent = parent->get_parent_object();
00498   }
00499   stack.push_back(global_config());
00500   //
00501   int n = stack.size();
00502   for (int i = n-1; i >= 0; i--) {
00503     uvm_config* config = stack[i];
00504     uvm_config_item* item = config->get_config_item(type,instname,field);
00505     if (item) {
00506       return item;
00507     }
00508   } 
00509   return 0;
00510 }

00522 void uvm_config_mgr::print_config_matches(bool b) {
